jld.title: Justia Elevate Platform Updates
description: The Justia Elevate platform was recently updated to incorporate new features, such as the ability to add YouTube Shorts URLs as videos. Additionally, we included coloring changes to the search button and image overlays.
description2: Your Yoast SEO plugin was upgraded to improve compatibility and performance! This enhancement means faster loading times and a smoother user experience. You can find more information on this upgrade here.
